page.title: 10HIGH PEAK COLLEGE
page.content: This a College of Further Education. We interviewed the Principal, {Mr {Fraser.}He has been at the college since just before 1964 when it moved to Harpur Hill; he is retiring this year.The college opened in{1955}in what is now Buxton Museum but moved into the old RAF buildings in Harpur Hill in 1964. These are still in use today although new buildings such as the Sports Hall were errected in the 1970s. There are 119 full-time staff, 90 part time staff and 100 non-teaching staff. There are 1057 full-time students mostly 16-19 years old and about 600 evening students of all ages. It is best known for its catering and hotel management couses; students on these couses are often from other parts of Derbyshire and are weekly boarders.
